All four PSA 4 commons are SOLD.

#1 - John Butler P350

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10343/butler[/IMG]

#2 - Jimmy Dygert SC350

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10425/dygert[/IMG]

#3 - Bill Milligan P350 has been SOLD

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10480/milligan[/IMG]

#4 - Claude Ritchey P150

[IMG]http://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-psa/10560/ritchey[/IMG]

Prices include shipping ($2 surcharge for regular PP/card)

$58 for one card.
$114 for two cards
$168 for three cards
$220 for the four bagger.  The four bagger is no longer available.

Use your Frank bucks to save even more.:)

Don't have Frank Bucks?  Buy now and save the next time.;)
